org.javafxdata.datasources.reader

Class FileSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javafxdata.datasources.reader.FileSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceReader

    public class FileSource
extends Object
implements DataSourceReader
    Implementation of DataSourceReader for (local) filesystems. Instances of this class can be created and passed in the constructor of a protocol implementations in the org.javafxdata.datasources.io package.
    Author:
    johan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileSource(File f)
      Create a FileSource based on an existing file.

      Create a FileSource based on an existing file.
      FileSource(InputStream is)
      Create a FileSource based on an existing inputstream.
      FileSource(InputStream is, Format format)
      Create a FileSource based on an existing inputstream.
      FileSource(String filename)
      Create a FileSource based on an existing file.
      FileSource(String filename, Format format)
      Create a FileSource based on an existing file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Format getInputFormat()
      Return the format of the data in this DataSourceReader.
      InputStream getInputStream()
      return an InputStream that can be read by protocol implementations and that contain the data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileSource

        public FileSource(String filename)
           throws FileNotFoundException
        Create a FileSource based on an existing file. By default, it is assumed the input format is XML. Use FileSource (String, Format) to specify a different format.
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

        FileNotFoundException

        public FileSource(InputStream is)
        Create a FileSource based on an existing inputstream. By default, it is assumed the input format is XML. Use FileSource (String, Format) to specify a different format.
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

    • Method Detail

      • getInputStream

        public InputStream getInputStream()
        Description copied from interface: DataSourceReader
        return an InputStream that can be read by protocol implementations and that contain the data. The format of the data on this InputStream is not specified.
        Specified by:
        getInputStream in interface DataSourceReader
        Returns:
        an InputStream containing data
